content: Earth Rakshasa enemies are one of the more difficult overworld enemies in Black Myth: Wukong. They are armed with giant, metal shields akin to those of Spearbones and use them to perform a similar charge move. Unlike Spearbones, however, the Earth Rakshasa can also create an explosion of fire to damage you even further.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Earth_Rakshasa_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Earth Rakshasa Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Earth Rakshasa Fight'.
The content is as follows:
Earth Rakshasa enemies are one of the more difficult overworld enemies in Black Myth: Wukong. They are armed with giant, metal shields akin to those of Spearbones and use them to perform a similar charge move. Unlike Spearbones, however, the Earth Rakshasa can also create an explosion of fire to damage you even further.
